pokemon.name: grookey
pokemon.dex: It attacks with rapid beats of its stick. As it strikes with amazing speed, it gets more and more pumped.

pokemon.name: thwackey
pokemon.dex: When it's drumming out rapid beats in battle, it gets so caught up in the rhythm that it won't even notice that it's already knocked out its opponent.

pokemon.name: rillaboom
pokemon.dex: By drumming, it taps into the power of its special tree stump. The roots of the stump follow its direction in battle.

pokemon.name: scorbunny
pokemon.dex: A warm-up of running around gets fire energy coursing through this Pokémon's body. Once that happens, it's ready to fight at full power.

pokemon.name: raboot
pokemon.dex: Its thick and fluffy fur protects it from the cold and enables it to use hotter fire moves.

pokemon.name: cinderace
pokemon.dex: It's skilled at both offense and defense, and it gets pumped up when cheered on. But if it starts showboating, it could put itself in a tough spot.

pokemon.name: sobble
pokemon.dex: When it gets wet, its skin changes color, and this Pokémon becomes invisible as if it were camouflaged.

pokemon.name: drizzile
pokemon.dex: Highly intelligent but also very lazy, it keeps enemies out of its territory by laying traps everywhere.

pokemon.name: inteleon
pokemon.dex: Its nictitating membranes let it pick out foes' weak points so it can precisely blast them with water that shoots from its fingertips at Mach 3.

pokemon.name: skwovet
pokemon.dex: It eats berries nonstop—a habit that has made it more resilient than it looks. It'll show up on farms, searching for yet more berries.

pokemon.name: greedent
pokemon.dex: It stashes berries in its tail—so many berries that they fall out constantly. But this Pokémon is a bit slow-witted, so it doesn't notice the loss.

pokemon.name: rookidee
pokemon.dex: Jumping nimbly about, this small-bodied Pokémon takes advantage of even the slightest opportunity to disorient larger opponents.

pokemon.name: corvisquire
pokemon.dex: The lessons of many harsh battles have taught it how to accurately judge an opponent's strength.

pokemon.name: corviknight
pokemon.dex: Although its wings have partly turned to steel and become heavy as a result, this Pokémon flies through the skies with ease.

pokemon.name: blipbug
pokemon.dex: A constant collector of information, this Pokémon is very smart. Very strong is what it isn't.

pokemon.name: dottler
pokemon.dex: As it grows inside its shell, it uses its psychic abilities to monitor the outside world and prepare for evolution.

pokemon.name: orbeetle
pokemon.dex: It emits psychic energy to observe and study what's around it—and what's around it can include things over six miles away.

pokemon.name: nickit
pokemon.dex: Aided by the soft pads on its feet, it silently raids the food stores of other Pokémon. It survives off its ill-gotten gains.

pokemon.name: thievul
pokemon.dex: It secretly marks potential targets with a scent. By following the scent, it stalks its targets and steals from them when they least expect it.

pokemon.name: gossifleur
pokemon.dex: It whirls around in the wind while singing a joyous song. This delightful display has charmed many into raising this Pokémon.

pokemon.name: eldegoss
pokemon.dex: The seeds attached to its cotton fluff are full of nutrients. It spreads them on the wind so that plants and other Pokémon can benefit from them.

pokemon.name: wooloo
pokemon.dex: Its curly fleece is such an effective cushion that this Pokémon could fall off a cliff and stand right back up at the bottom, unharmed.

pokemon.name: dubwool
pokemon.dex: Its majestic horns are meant only to impress the opposite gender. They never see use in battle.

pokemon.name: chewtle
pokemon.dex: Apparently the itch of its teething impels it to snap its jaws at anything in front of it.

pokemon.name: drednaw
pokemon.dex: With jaws that can shear through steel rods, this highly aggressive Pokémon chomps down on its unfortunate prey.

pokemon.name: yamper
pokemon.dex: This gluttonous Pokémon only assists people with their work because it wants treats. As it runs, it crackles with electricity.

pokemon.name: boltund
pokemon.dex: It sends electricity through its legs to boost their strength. Running at top speed, it easily breaks 50 mph.

pokemon.name: rolycoly
pokemon.dex: It can race around like a unicycle, even on rough, rocky terrain. Burning coal sustains it.

pokemon.name: carkol
pokemon.dex: By rapidly rolling its legs, it can travel at over 18 mph. The temperature of the flames it breathes exceeds 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit.

pokemon.name: coalossal
pokemon.dex: It's usually peaceful, but the vandalism of mines enrages it. Offenders will be incinerated with flames that reach 2,700 degrees Fahrenheit.

pokemon.name: applin
pokemon.dex: It spends its entire life inside an apple. It hides from its natural enemies, bird Pokémon, by pretending it's just an apple and nothing more.

pokemon.name: flapple
pokemon.dex: It ate a sour apple, and that induced its evolution. In its cheeks, it stores an acid capable of causing chemical burns.

pokemon.name: appletun
pokemon.dex: Eating a sweet apple caused its evolution. A nectarous scent wafts from its body, luring in the bug Pokémon it preys on.

pokemon.name: silicobra
pokemon.dex: It spews sand from its nostrils. While the enemy is blinded, it burrows into the ground to hide.

pokemon.name: sandaconda
pokemon.dex: Its unique style of coiling allows it to blast sand out of its sand sac more efficiently.

pokemon.name: cramorant
pokemon.dex: It's so strong that it can knock out some opponents in a single hit, but it also may forget what it's battling midfight.

pokemon.name: arrokuda
pokemon.dex: If it sees any movement around it, this Pokémon charges for it straightaway, leading with its sharply pointed jaw. It's very proud of that jaw.

pokemon.name: barraskewda
pokemon.dex: It spins its tail fins to propel itself, surging forward at speeds of over 100 knots before ramming prey and spearing into them.

pokemon.name: toxel
pokemon.dex: It manipulates the chemical makeup of its poison to produce electricity. The voltage is weak, but it can cause a tingling paralysis.

pokemon.name: toxtricity
pokemon.dex: This short-tempered and aggressive Pokémon chugs stagnant water to absorb any toxins it might contain.

pokemon.name: sizzlipede
pokemon.dex: It stores flammable gas in its body and uses it to generate heat. The yellow sections on its belly get particularly hot.

pokemon.name: centiskorch
pokemon.dex: While its burning body is already dangerous on its own, this excessively hostile Pokémon also has large and very sharp fangs.

pokemon.name: clobbopus
pokemon.dex: Its tentacles tear off easily, but it isn't alarmed when that happens—it knows they'll grow back. It's about as smart as a three-year-old.

pokemon.name: grapploct
pokemon.dex: Searching for an opponent to test its skills against, it emerges onto land. Once the battle is over, it returns to the sea.

pokemon.name: sinistea
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon is said to have been born when a lonely spirit possessed a cold, leftover cup of tea.

pokemon.name: polteageist
pokemon.dex: These Pokémon multiply by creeping into teapots and pouring themselves into leftover tea.

pokemon.name: hatenna
pokemon.dex: If this Pokémon senses a strong emotion, it will run away as fast as it can. It prefers areas without people.

pokemon.name: hattrem
pokemon.dex: No matter who you are, if you bring strong emotions near this Pokémon, it will silence you violently.

pokemon.name: hatterene
pokemon.dex: It emits psychic power strong enough to cause headaches as a deterrent to the approach of others.

pokemon.name: impidimp
pokemon.dex: It sneaks into people's homes, stealing things and feasting on the negative energy of the frustrated occupants.

pokemon.name: morgrem
pokemon.dex: With sly cunning, it tries to lure people into the woods. Some believe it to have the power to make crops grow.

pokemon.name: grimmsnarl
pokemon.dex: Its hairs work like muscle fibers. When its hairs unfurl, they latch on to opponents, ensnaring them as tentacles would.

pokemon.name: obstagoon
pokemon.dex: It evolved after experiencing numerous fights. While crossing its arms, it lets out a shout that would make any opponent flinch.

pokemon.name: perrserker
pokemon.dex: What appears to be an iron helmet is actually hardened hair. This Pokémon lives for the thrill of battle.

pokemon.name: cursola
pokemon.dex: Be cautious of the ectoplasmic body surrounding its soul. You'll become stiff as stone if you touch it.

pokemon.name: sirfetch'd
pokemon.dex: After deflecting attacks with its hard leaf shield, it strikes back with its sharp leek stalk. The leek stalk is both weapon and food.

pokemon.name: mr-rime
pokemon.dex: Its amusing movements make it very popular. It releases its psychic power from the pattern on its belly.

pokemon.name: runerigus
pokemon.dex: Never touch its shadowlike body, or you'll be shown the horrific memories behind the picture carved into it.

pokemon.name: milcery
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon was born from sweet-smelling particles in the air. Its body is made of cream.

pokemon.name: alcremie
pokemon.dex: When it trusts a Trainer, it will treat them to berries it's decorated with cream.

pokemon.name: falinks
pokemon.dex: Five of them are troopers, and one is the brass. The brass's orders are absolute.

pokemon.name: pincurchin
pokemon.dex: It feeds on seaweed, using its teeth to scrape it off rocks. Electric current flows from the tips of its spines.

pokemon.name: snom
pokemon.dex: It eats snow that piles up on the ground. The more snow it eats, the bigger and more impressive the spikes on its back grow.

pokemon.name: frosmoth
pokemon.dex: It causes blizzards as it flies around with its huge, chill-emanating wings. Clean meltwater is its favorite thing to drink.

pokemon.name: stonjourner
pokemon.dex: Once a year, on a specific date and at a specific time, they gather out of nowhere and form up in a circle.

pokemon.name: eiscue
pokemon.dex: It drifted in on the flow of ocean waters from a frigid place. It keeps its head iced constantly to make sure it stays nice and cold.

pokemon.name: indeedee
pokemon.dex: Through its horns, it can pick up on the emotions of creatures around it. Positive emotions are the source of its strength.

pokemon.name: morpeko
pokemon.dex: It has a small stomach. If it isn't constantly eating the seeds it keeps in its pockets, it will get hungry immediately.

pokemon.name: cufant
pokemon.dex: It digs up the ground with its trunk. It's also very strong, being able to carry loads of over five tons without any problem at all.

pokemon.name: copperajah
pokemon.dex: These Pokémon live in herds. Their trunks have incredible grip strength, strong enough to crush giant rocks into powder.

pokemon.name: dracozolt
pokemon.dex: The powerful muscles in its tail generate its electricity. Compared to its lower body, its upper half is entirely too small.

pokemon.name: arctozolt
pokemon.dex: The shaking of its freezing upper half is what generates its electricity. It has a hard time walking around.

pokemon.name: dracovish
pokemon.dex: Powerful legs and jaws made it the apex predator of its time. Its own overhunting of its prey was what drove it to extinction.

pokemon.name: arctovish
pokemon.dex: The skin on its face is impervious to attack, but breathing difficulties made this Pokémon go extinct anyway.

pokemon.name: duraludon
pokemon.dex: Its body resembles polished metal, and it's both lightweight and strong. The only drawback is that it rusts easily.

pokemon.name: dreepy
pokemon.dex: After being reborn as a ghost Pokémon, ______ wanders the areas it used to inhabit back when it was alive in prehistoric seas.

pokemon.name: drakloak
pokemon.dex: It's capable of flying faster than 120 mph. It battles alongside Dreepy and dotes on them until they successfully evolve.

pokemon.name: dragapult
pokemon.dex: When it isn't battling, it keeps Dreepy in the holes on its horns. Once a fight starts, it launches the Dreepy like supersonic missiles.

pokemon.name: zacian
pokemon.dex: Known as a legendary hero, this Pokémon absorbs metal particles, transforming them into a weapon it uses to battle.

pokemon.name: zamazenta
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon slept for aeons while in the form of a statue. It was asleep for so long, people forgot that it ever existed.

pokemon.name: eternatus
pokemon.dex: It was inside a meteorite that fell 20,000 years ago. There seems to be a connection between this Pokémon and the Dynamax phenomenon.

pokemon.name: kubfu
pokemon.dex: _____ trains hard to perfect its moves. The moves it masters will determine which form it takes when it evolves.

pokemon.name: urshifu
pokemon.dex: Inhabiting the mountains of a distant region, this Pokémon races across sheer cliffs, training its legs and refining its moves.

pokemon.name: zarude
pokemon.dex: Within dense forests, this Pokémon lives in a pack with others of its kind. It's incredibly aggressive, and the other Pokémon of the forest fear it.

pokemon.name: regieleki
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon is a cluster of electrical energy. It's said that removing the rings on _________'s body will unleash the Pokémon's latent power.

pokemon.name: regidrago
pokemon.dex: Its body is composed of crystallized dragon energy. _________ is said to have the powers of every dragon Pokémon.

pokemon.name: glastrier
pokemon.dex: _________ has tremendous physical strength, and the mask of ice covering its face is 100 times harder than diamond.

pokemon.name: spectrier
pokemon.dex: As it dashes through the night, _________ absorbs the life-force of sleeping creatures. It craves silence and solitude.

pokemon.name: calyrex
pokemon.dex: _______ is a merciful Pokémon, capable of providing healing and blessings. It reigned over the Galar region in times of yore.

pokemon.name: wyrdeer
pokemon.dex: The black orbs shine with an uncanny light when the Pokémon is erecting invisible barriers. The fur shed from its beard retains heat well and is a highly useful material for winter clothing.

pokemon.name: kleavor
pokemon.dex: Parts of its body turned to stone when it evolved thanks to an extremely rare ore found in volcanic areas.

pokemon.name: ursaluna
pokemon.dex: I believe it was Hisui's swampy terrain that gave Ursaluna its burly physique and newfound capacity to manipulate peat at will.

pokemon.name: basculegion
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon is cloaked in the souls of its comrades who perished during a punishing journey to the river of their birth.

pokemon.name: sneasler
pokemon.dex: Because of Sneasler's virulent poison and daunting physical prowess, no other species could hope to best it on the frozen highlands. Preferring solitude, this species does not form packs.

pokemon.name: overqwil
pokemon.dex: Its lancelike spikes and savage temperament have earned it the nickname 'sea fiend.' It slurps up poison to nourish itself.

pokemon.name: enamorus
pokemon.dex: When it flies to this land from across the sea, the bitter winter comes to an end. According to legend, this Pokémon's love gives rise to the budding of fresh life across Hisui.
